blogs.title: Understanding TypeScript
blogs.author: Jane Smith
blogs.content: TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript that adds static typing to the language. It helps catch errors early in development and makes code more maintainable. Learn how TypeScript can improve your Angular development workflow.

blogs.title: Angular Components Explained
blogs.author: Mike Johnson
blogs.content: Components are the building blocks of Angular applications. Every component has a TypeScript class, HTML template, and CSS styles. Understanding components is essential for building effective Angular applications.

blogs.title: Test Blog Post
blogs.author: Test Author
blogs.content: This is a test blog post created to verify the functionality of the blog application.
